EmailTemplate.name: David, when can we meet? (1559077152.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: David, when can we meet? (1559077152.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
David,
I'm following up on our previous conversations about how we can help you consolidate your supply lines and reduce indirect spending.
What's your best availability next week if I want to drop by for an exploratory conversation?​
It's a win-win for you - you either get a consolidated supplier with better pricing and enterprise-grade platforms, or you get confirmation that your existing strategy is the best course.
Please advise.
Kind regards, Sal Ziauddin Business Development Manager - GTA Central 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: salziauddin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:salziauddin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 416.414.7631
